timeline.bodyText: What is the key thing of this jira? Just refactor getAllMetaRegionLocations to syncRoot? And I thought maybe need a better name for understand.
timeline.author: infraio

replies.bodyText:
The key change is the syncRoot method. The getAllMetaRegionLocations method is also used at client side, so it is not suitable to add parameters which are not useful for client.
The point here is that, we should test the MVCC number of the catalog family when syncing root, if there is no change, then we do not need to recreate the meta cache.
And there is a follow on issue to fan out the edits to catalog family to backup masters.
